entry.title: hexo.md
entry.content: HEXOstep1hexo init mybloghexo new ‘firstblog’hexo ghexo d step2部署：修改站点配置文件：deploy: type: git repository: github@github.com:N-damo.github.io.git branch: master运行：npm install hexo-deployer-git –save运行：hexo g（本地生成静态文件）运行：hexo d（将本地静态文件推送至Github）打开浏览器，访问https://n-damo.github.io
